snippet: Serena Williams, the world’s No. 1 player, said Sunday that she was ready to rejoin the women’s tennis tour after a bout with pain and injuries that caused her to cut short her 2015 season.
abstract: Serena Williams is ready to rejoin women's tennis tour after her 2015 season was cut short because of injury; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams, the world’s No. 1 player, said Sunday that she was ready to rejoin the women’s tennis tour after a bout with pain and injuries that caused her to cut short her 2015 season.
